definitions: the craft or pastime of stringing beads together to make jewelry or other decorative items

examples.text: they'll have wire or string and the other tools you need to get into beading

shortDefinitions: craft of stringing beads together to make jewellery

definitions: decoration in the form of beads

examples.text: a matching blue shawl with sparkling beading

definitions: decoration or ornamental molding resembling a string of beads or having a semicircular cross section

examples.text: elaborate wooden beading adorned the ceiling

shortDefinitions: decoration or ornamental moulding resembling string of beads
